data.question: What is the chemical formula of the ultrastable three-dimensional cage-like MOF reported?
What properties make polydentate cyanurate ligands suitable for constructing stable MOFs?
data.answer: High coordination site density and the special π-conjugated plane structure.

data.question: Is SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 stable in both acidic and alkaline conditions?
What is the highest porosity percentage reported among cyanuric acid-based MOF materials?
Can SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 achieve efficient C3H4/C3H6 separation under dynamic conditions?
What is the maximum thermal stability temperature of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
What experimental technique was used to confirm the microporous feature of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
Does SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 exhibit higher adsorption capacity for C3H4 over C3H6 at 273 K?
What is the role of Sr2+ and Cu2+ ions in the structure of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
data.answer: Sr2+ and Cu2+ form independent network frameworks by coordinating with O and N atoms, respectively.

data.question: Is the porosity of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 calculated or experimentally determined?
What is the adsorption capacity of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 for CO2 at 195 K?
What method was used for the synthesis of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
Does the structure of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 remain undamaged after exposure to air for six months?
What is the significance of the cage-neck structure in SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
data.answer: It may provide different diffusion kinetics for molecules with different shapes and diameters.

data.question: Is the stability of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 attributed to the high ratio of coordination sites in the organic ligand?
What is the BET surface area of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
What is the role of DFT calculations in the study of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
data.answer: To determine the interaction sites of the framework with gas molecules.

data.question: Is the adsorption energy of C3H4 on SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 higher than that of C3H6?
What is the crystal system of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2?
Does the structure of SrCu(HC3N3O3)2 include two sets of independent coordination networks?
